name: HMI Graphic Displays
description:
If im=non SB then
Calculated Hrs = Q * ( sd + md * 2 + cd * 3 + vcd * 4 + rd * 0.5 )
Else If ges= none and im=SB then
calculated Hrs=  Q * ( sd + md * 2 + cd * 3 + vcd * 4 + rd * 0.5 ) * 0.9
Else If ges!=none and im=SB then
calculated Hrs= Q * ( sd + md * 2 + cd * 3 + vcd * 4 + rd * 0.5 ) * 0.9 * 1.2
